headline: GALILEO ROTARY VANE PUMP 5.8 CFM
description: Rotary Vane Pump          Once sold all mechanical pumps are rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise.  All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor.  Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.  Please inquire about availability and cost
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
